executive_summary.heading: Executive Summary
executive_summary.prompt: Generate a 3-paragraph executive summary focusing on business impact, competitive advantage, and ROI potential. Include revenue projections and market opportunity.

business_impact.heading: Business Impact & ROI
business_impact.prompt: Detail quantifiable business outcomes, revenue impact, cost savings, and market position advantages. Include timeline for ROI realization.

competitive_advantage.heading: Competitive Differentiation
competitive_advantage.prompt: Explain how this creates sustainable competitive advantage, market barriers, and unique positioning vs competitors.

resource_requirements.heading: Investment Requirements
resource_requirements.prompt: Outline required budget, team resources, timeline, and expected returns. Include risk mitigation strategies.

strategic_alignment.heading: Strategic Alignment
strategic_alignment.prompt: Connect this initiative to company vision, growth objectives, and long-term strategic goals.

product_overview.heading: Product Overview
product_overview.prompt: Provide comprehensive product description, target users, problem statement, and solution overview.

user_stories.heading: User Stories & Acceptance Criteria
user_stories.prompt: Generate detailed user stories with acceptance criteria, edge cases, and success metrics for each feature.

feature_requirements.heading: Feature Requirements
feature_requirements.prompt: Detail core features, nice-to-have features, and technical requirements with priority levels.

user_experience.heading: User Experience Flow
user_experience.prompt: Describe user journey, interaction flows, UI/UX considerations, and usability requirements.

success_metrics.heading: Success Metrics & KPIs
success_metrics.prompt: Define measurable success criteria, KPIs, analytics requirements, and performance benchmarks.

dependencies.heading: Dependencies & Constraints
dependencies.prompt: Identify technical dependencies, external integrations, resource constraints, and risk factors.

architecture_overview.heading: System Architecture
architecture_overview.prompt: Detail system architecture, component interactions, data flow, and technical stack decisions.

api_specifications.heading: API Specifications
api_specifications.prompt: Define API endpoints, request/response formats, authentication, error handling, and rate limiting.

database_schema.heading: Database Design
database_schema.prompt: Describe database schema, relationships, indexing strategy, and data migration requirements.

security_requirements.heading: Security & Compliance
security_requirements.prompt: Detail security measures, authentication/authorization, data protection, and compliance requirements.

performance_requirements.heading: Performance & Scalability
performance_requirements.prompt: Define performance benchmarks, scalability requirements, load handling, and optimization strategies.

deployment_strategy.heading: Deployment & DevOps
deployment_strategy.prompt: Outline deployment pipeline, infrastructure requirements, monitoring, and maintenance procedures.

value_proposition.heading: Core Value Proposition
value_proposition.prompt: Create compelling value proposition statements, unique selling points, and benefit-driven messaging.

target_audience.heading: Target Audience Personas
target_audience.prompt: Define detailed user personas, pain points, motivations, and communication preferences.

messaging_framework.heading: Messaging Framework
messaging_framework.prompt: Develop key messages, supporting points, proof points, and call-to-action strategies.

content_strategy.heading: Content Strategy
content_strategy.prompt: Plan content types, distribution channels, content calendar, and engagement strategies.

brand_voice.heading: Brand Voice & Tone
brand_voice.prompt: Define brand personality, voice characteristics, tone guidelines, and communication style.

campaign_ideas.heading: Campaign Concepts
campaign_ideas.prompt: Generate creative campaign ideas, promotional strategies, and launch tactics.

test_strategy.heading: Testing Strategy
test_strategy.prompt: Define testing approach, test types, coverage requirements, and quality gates.

test_cases.heading: Test Cases & Scenarios
test_cases.prompt: Generate detailed test cases, test scenarios, expected results, and pass/fail criteria.

edge_cases.heading: Edge Cases & Error Handling
edge_cases.prompt: Identify edge cases, error conditions, boundary testing, and exception handling scenarios.

performance_testing.heading: Performance Testing
performance_testing.prompt: Define load testing scenarios, stress testing requirements, and performance benchmarks.

automation_strategy.heading: Test Automation
automation_strategy.prompt: Plan automation approach, tool selection, test data management, and CI/CD integration.

validation_criteria.heading: Acceptance Validation
validation_criteria.prompt: Define acceptance criteria, sign-off requirements, and quality metrics for release readiness.

simple_overview.heading: What This Is
simple_overview.prompt: Explain in simple terms what this system does, why it's important, and how it helps users.

key_concepts.heading: Key Concepts
key_concepts.prompt: Break down important concepts, terminology, and how different parts work together in easy-to-understand language.

getting_started.heading: Getting Started Steps
getting_started.prompt: Provide step-by-step instructions for basic setup, first tasks, and initial exploration.

common_tasks.heading: Common Tasks
common_tasks.prompt: List frequent activities, how to perform them, and what to expect as results.

troubleshooting.heading: Common Issues & Solutions
troubleshooting.prompt: Identify typical problems newcomers face and provide clear solutions or who to ask for help.

next_steps.heading: Learning Path
next_steps.prompt: Suggest learning progression, advanced topics to explore, and resources for deeper understanding.

ai_analysis_prompts.code_analysis: Analyze this code file to understand its purpose, key functions, main features, technical architecture, dependencies, and business value. Focus on extracting actionable insights for documentation.
ai_analysis_prompts.feature_extraction: Extract core features, user benefits, technical capabilities, integration points, and business impact from this system. Identify what makes it unique and valuable.
ai_analysis_prompts.business_value: Determine the business value, market opportunity, competitive advantages, and revenue potential of this system. Consider both direct and indirect benefits.
ai_analysis_prompts.technical_complexity: Assess the technical complexity, scalability considerations, security implications, and architectural decisions. Identify key engineering challenges and solutions.
ai_analysis_prompts.user_impact: Analyze how this system affects end users, what problems it solves, what experience it provides, and what outcomes it enables.
ai_analysis_prompts.implementation_scope: Determine implementation requirements, timeline estimates, resource needs, dependencies, and potential risks or challenges.
